imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.disclaimerText:
The content of our pages has been created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the content.

As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages according to general law pursuant to § 7 para. 1 TMG. However, pursuant to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, we are not under obligation to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances indicating illegal activity.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing and using the Solvbox application, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
terms.useLicenseText:
Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of Solvbox per device for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:

• modify or copy the materials
• use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
• attempt to reverse engineer any software contained in Solvbox
• remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials
terms.disclaimerText: The materials in Solvbox are provided on an 'as is' basis. Solvbox makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
terms.limitationsText: In no event shall Solvbox or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials in Solvbox, even if Solvbox or a Solvbox authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.
terms.privacyPolicyText: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the Service, to understand our practices.
terms.modificationsText: Solvbox may revise these terms of service at any time without notice. By using this application, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.
terms.contactInfoText:
If you have any questions about these Terms & Conditions, please contact us at:

Email: legal@solvbox.com
Phone: +49 30 123 456 789
Address: Musterstraße 123, 10115 Berlin, Germany

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.infoWeCollectText:
We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support. This may include:

• Name and contact information
• Account credentials
• Professional information
• Usage data and preferences
• Device and technical information
privacy.howWeUseText:
We use the information we collect to:

• Provide, maintain, and improve our services
• Process transactions and send related information
• Send technical notices and support messages
• Respond to your comments and questions
• Personalize your experience
• Monitor and analyze usage patterns
privacy.infoSharingText:
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy. We may share your information:

• With service providers who assist us in operating our platform
• When required by law or to protect our rights
• In connection with a business transfer or acquisition
• With your explicit consent
privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.
privacy.yourRightsText:
If you are located in the European Union, you have certain rights regarding your personal data:

• Right to access your personal data
• Right to rectify inaccurate data
• Right to erase your data
• Right to restrict processing
• Right to data portability
• Right to object to processing
privacy.cookiesTrackingText: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect information about your browsing activities and to provide personalized content. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.
privacy.childrensPrivacyText: Our services are not directed to children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16. If we become aware that we have collected such information, we will take steps to delete it.
privacy.contactUsText:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

Email: privacy@solvbox.com
Phone: +49 30 123 456 789
Address: Musterstraße 123, 10115 Berlin, Germany

Data Protection Officer: dpo@solvbox.com

casestudy.infoBox: A strong case study brings you years of visibility and qualified inquiries – without active sales efforts.

notification.title: Case Study Verification

chat.greeting: Hello! I am {{name}}. How can I help you today?

solvbox.welcome: Your personal assistant for business consulting and problem-solving.

regular.welcome: Welcome to chat. How can I help you today?

responses.interesting: That's an interesting question. I have some information for you on this topic.
responses.help: I'd be happy to help you with that. Here is some relevant information.
responses.understand: I understand your concern. Let me look into it.
responses.information: I've gathered various information on this topic for you.
responses.thanks: Thank you for your inquiry. I'll look for the appropriate information right away.

create.title: Create Case Study
create.introTitle: What type of case study would you like to create?
create.introText: Choose the appropriate frame for your case study to best present your success.

action.title: Action
action.subtitle: What was done? How was the approach?

list.title: Case Studies
list.intro: Below you will find all case studies with details about achieved results and approaches.
list.verifiedIntro: Below you will find all verified case studies that have been confirmed by project partners.

contextModal.title: Context for Olivia
contextModal.infoDescription: This information is only visible to Olivia and helps to find the best matches for your case study. It will not be displayed publicly.
contextModal.infoExamples: Examples: target audience, requirements, industry, company size, budget, etc.
contextModal.placeholder: e.g. Target audience: Medium-sized businesses with 50-200 employees that already have a basic structure...

pricingModal.title: Pricing
pricingModal.infoDescription: This information is only visible to Olivia and helps to find the perfect matches for your case study. Providing price information is crucial to connect you with the right potential clients.
pricingModal.infoExamples: Examples: €5,000-10,000, starting from €2,500, fixed price €7,500, etc.
pricingModal.placeholder: e.g. Price range: €5,000-10,000 depending on complexity and customization requirements

wizard1.questionTitle: What is your case study about?
wizard1.questionSubtitle: Briefly describe the main topic or problem you solved.
wizard1.placeholder: e.g. Optimizing customer acquisition through digital strategies...

wizard2.questionTitle: Who is this case study particularly relevant for?
wizard2.questionSubtitle: Describe your target audience or who could benefit from your solution.
wizard2.placeholder: e.g. Small and medium enterprises in B2B, marketing managers...

wizard3.questionTitle: What was the initial situation, idea or specific problem?
wizard3.questionSubtitle: Describe the context and what led to your solution.
wizard3.placeholder: e.g. Our company had difficulties with customer acquisition...

wizard4.questionTitle: What was the goal you wanted to achieve?
wizard4.questionSubtitle: Describe the desired result or success you aimed for.
wizard4.placeholder: e.g. Increase leads by 40%, reduce costs by 25%, improve customer satisfaction...

wizard5.questionTitle: What was implemented? (concrete & with relevant measures)
wizard5.questionSubtitle: Describe the concrete steps and measures. Feel free to mention unconventional or creative approaches.
wizard5.placeholder: e.g. Implementation of AI-based lead qualification, guerrilla marketing campaign, switch to agile working methods...

wizard6.questionTitle: What were the concrete results – in impact and numbers?
wizard6.questionSubtitle: 💡 Tip: The more hard facts (numbers, data, facts), the better your matching.
wizard6.placeholder: e.g. 40% more leads, 25% cost reduction, ROI of 300%, 95% customer satisfaction, finished 6 weeks earlier...

wizard7.questionTitle: What budget volume did this project have?
wizard7.infoText: With clear budget information you get significantly better leads! Olivia prefers case studies with transparent budget information when in doubt. You can decide yourself whether your budget is publicly visible or only internally visible.
wizard7.financingModelPlaceholder: e.g. Performance-based compensation, equity deal, lump sum price after milestone...

wizard8.questionTitle: Is there anything else you would like to highlight?
wizard8.questionSubtitle: Optional - Awards, partners, testimonials, special insights or other highlights that haven't been mentioned yet. The more details, the more meaningful your case study becomes!
wizard8.placeholder: e.g. Award as 'Most Innovative Solution 2023', partnership with Google, 98% customer satisfaction...

mockCase.title: Digital Transformation in E-Commerce
mockCase.shortDescription: AI-optimized solution to increase conversion rate through personalized product recommendations and automated customer analysis.
mockCase.context: A medium-sized e-commerce company in the fashion and lifestyle sector struggled with declining conversion rates and high shopping cart abandonment. Despite increasing website traffic, sales could not be increased proportionally. The existing recommendation system was outdated and could not effectively capture individual customer preferences.
mockCase.action: Implementation of an AI-based recommendation engine with machine learning algorithms for real-time analysis of user behavior. Integration of a personalized dashboard system for customers as well as automated email marketing campaigns based on individual purchasing patterns and browsing behavior.

result.text: The implementation led to measurable success within the first 6 months after go-live.
result.bulletpoint3: 28% increase in average shopping cart value

techstaff.title: From 8 to 3 weeks: Munich Engineer Recruitment
techstaff.description: Fast placement of qualified civil engineers for renovation projects through expert headhunting
techstaff.compactSummary: Engineer hiring time slashed from 8 to 3 weeks for a major Munich developer. 94% success rate, 75% cost reduction - from €3,500 to €850 per placement.
techstaff.context: A Munich-based property developer needed urgent civil engineers for multiple apartment building renovations. Traditional job postings yielded no suitable candidates within the required timeframe.
techstaff.action: TechStaff München provided specialized headhunting services with pre-screened candidates from their network of 500+ civil engineers. Each candidate was evaluated for project fit, availability, and budget requirements.

result.text: Perfect engineer placement within 3 weeks with excellent project outcomes:
bulletpoints: Engineer placement in 3 weeks vs. 8 weeks industry average
Only €850 placement fee vs. €3,500 industry standard
94% success rate with long-term project completion
Ongoing support and replacement guarantee included

flexengineers.title: Express Placement: Engineer found in 5 days
flexengineers.description: All-inclusive engineer staffing for short-term building projects with on-site coordination
flexengineers.compactSummary: The impossible delivered - a senior engineer with 12+ years experience found in just 5 days. All-inclusive service at €13,200/month: no delays, no complications, just results.
flexengineers.context: A construction company needed experienced structural engineers for a 4-month loft conversion project. The budget was tight and they needed someone to start immediately with minimal onboarding.
flexengineers.action: FlexEngineers provided a senior civil engineer with 12+ years experience in structural work. The service included all administrative handling, insurance, and project management coordination.

result.text: Immediate engineer deployment with comprehensive project support:
bulletpoints: Engineer available in 5 days vs. 4 weeks typical search time
All-inclusive rate of €13,200/month including taxes and insurance
On-site project manager for seamless integration
Flexible contract with weekly billing adjustments
Project completed 2 weeks ahead of schedule

buildtalent.title: Scalable Engineering Solutions for Construction Projects
buildtalent.description: Digital platform connecting construction companies with vetted freelance structural engineers
buildtalent.compactSummary: 150+ verified experts, perfect matches in 48 hours at €12,500/month average. 97% budget adherence, instant scaling - flexible engineering power on-demand.
buildtalent.context: A medium-sized construction firm needed flexible access to structural engineers for varying project demands. Traditional hiring was too slow and expensive for their dynamic workflow.
buildtalent.action: BuildTalent provided access to their network of 150+ pre-qualified structural engineers. The platform handled vetting, contract management, and performance tracking with AI-powered matching.

result.text: Rapid freelancer matching with transparent pricing and quality control:
bulletpoints: Engineer matching in 48 hours vs. 3-4 weeks traditional search
Quality guarantee with performance tracking system
Flexible scaling up/down based on project needs
